item.title: Wolfgang Lucht
item.description:
"We conclude that the RCB (Remaining Carbon Budget) for a 50% chance of keeping warming to 1.5‚Äâ¬∞C is around 250‚ÄâGtCO2 as of Jan 2023, equal to around six years of current CO2 emissions. For a 50% chance of 2‚Äâ¬∞C the RCB is around 1,200‚ÄâGtCO2."An update to the IPCC's CO2 budgets, which are several years old, in terms of newer data and updated methods. NOT good news. Follows a previous paper in ESSD by Forster et al. (2023) with comparable findings.Open access:
https://www.nature.com/articles/s41558-023-01848-5

item.title: Ida Momennejad
item.description:
üì¢üß†ü§ñ Thrilled to share new work with Taylor Webb & Shanka Mondal:A Prefrontal Cortex-inspired Architecture for Planning in Large Language Models
https://lnkd.in/g-PhNfMTLLMs struggle with multi-step reasoning and planning.We propose a solution inspired by human brain function: planning via recurrent interactions of prefrontal cortex (PFC) subregions. The modular architecture with multiple LLM calls substantially improves performance on Graph traversal & Tower of Hanoi.
1/n üßµ

item.title: Richard Sever
item.description: Plan S re-fashioned as Plan U? https://www.nature.com/articles/d41586-023-03342-6They call for a scholar-led system and articles available from the outset. In this respect it looks familiar ;-) https://journals.plos.org/plosbiology/article?id=10.1371/journal.pbio.3000273I note this "seems a recognition that the first version of Plan S was going in an undesirable direction: its vision of open access has been delivered through business models which are highly inequitable‚Äù. How peer review is paid for is TBD tho. And we mustn't forget other checks https://journals.plos.org/plosbiology/article?id=10.1371/journal.pbio.3002234

item.title: evacide
item.description: If you have a uterus and you live in the UK, it's time to update your threat model to include police testing you for the presence of abortion meds and requesting data from period-tracking apps: https://www.tortoisemedia.com/2023/10/30/british-police-testing-women-for-abortion-drugs/

item.title: Blake Richards
item.description: PSA:The NSF AI Institute for Artificial and Natural Intelligence (ARNI) Is looking for postdocs! Fellows will be based at @Columbia, NYC, but can work with ARNI researchers at multiple institutions. More info: https://arni-institute.org#NeuroAi #AIResearch #neuroscience

item.title: Manlio De Domenico
item.description: Quiz: can you guess what it is (in terms of a general dynamical process or even using a specific example) just by watching how the system changes over time?#ComplexNetworks #NetworkScience #ComplexSystems

item.title: James Gleick
item.description: Here is the first act of the new right-wing Republican leadership of the House: As a condition of aiding Israel, they insist on defunding the IRS‚Äôs ability to go after rich tax cheats.Not sure why that isn‚Äôt getting bigger play in the mainstream press.https://www.washingtonpost.com/politics/2023/10/31/israel-ukraine-congress-senate-austin-blinken/a47a753e-77a2-11ee-97dd-7a173b1bd730_story.html

item.title: Lucas Cantor
item.description: Your annual reminder that Halloween is by far the deadliest day of the year for children in the US.It's not due to poison in the candy, stranger danger, or spooky satanists, though...It's cars. Kids are routinely hit and killed by cars, and we don't bat an eye, let alone change anything. This is what real horror looks like.Children are three times more likely to be fatally injured by a car on Halloween, and the risk grows to 10 times for kids aged 4 to 8.#BikeTooter #CarFree #Halloween #KidicalMass

item.title: Prof Stephen Serjeant
item.description: #UKRI have caved. Most alarming of all in the response is UKRI's review of advisory body appointments. #DfE already monitor social media of teachers critical of govt policy, & govt has blocked govt-critical scientists from speaking in their expert capacities at govt events https://www.ukri.org/news/response-to-the-open-letter-from-the-secretary-of-state/

item.title: BrainGlobe
item.description: Hi everyone! The BrainGlobe Initiative exists to facilitate the development of interoperable Python-based tools for computational neuroanatomy, particularly in model organisms.For more details please see https://brainglobe.info or chat with us at https://brainglobe.zulipchat.com.#neuroscience

item.title: Steven Strogatz
item.description:
I just posted two video lectures from my undergrad complex analysis course. One is about Cauchy's theorem and the other is about Jordan's lemma. They both involve beautiful mathematical arguments ‚Äì I hope you enjoy them! Cauchy‚Äôs theorem
https://youtu.be/AjrkNlgwT_UJordan‚Äôs lemma
https://youtu.be/C5rukxDDW8USomeday I hope to post all the lectures in this course, but for now I'm just posting occasional Zoom videos that I've recorded for whatever random reason.

item.title: Laffy
item.description:
1/... Senate Judiciary Committee announced plans to vote to subpoena billionaires who reportedly gave lavish gifts to #SupremeCourt Justices #ClarenceThomas & #Alito.Sen. Durbin (D-Ill.) & Sen. Whitehouse (D-R.I.) said in a statement that they plan to subpoena billionaires Harlan Crow & Robin Arkley, as well as conservative judicial activist Leonard Leo. #SCOTUS
https://www.axios.com/2023/10/31/democrats-supoena-harlan-crow-leonard-leo-supreme-court-justices
